WS_SCOPES.GET_VIDEOS_DESCRIPTION: Get a paginated list of videos
WS_SCOPES.UPDATE_VIDEOS_DESCRIPTION: Update videos properties (title, description, category, custom properties etc.)
WS_SCOPES.DELETE_VIDEOS_DESCRIPTION: Delete one or several videos from the catalog
WS_SCOPES.GET_PROPERTIES_DESCRIPTION: Get a paginated list of custom properties
WS_SCOPES.UPDATE_PROPERTIES_DESCRIPTION: Update custom properties (type, name, description etc.)
WS_SCOPES.DELETE_PROPERTIES_DESCRIPTION: Delete one or several custom properties

PERMISSIONS.RETRY_VIDEO_DESCRIPTION: Retry to launch manually the video saving process

MEDIAS.TITLE: Catalog
MEDIAS.INFO: The catalog displays all uploaded videos and their status. Each video can be published, unpublished, viewed or deleted.
MEDIAS.SHARECODE: To share the video, copy the HTML code below and paste it in your page :
MEDIAS.FORM_ADD_CATEGORY_DESC: The category the video belongs to
MEDIAS.FORM_ADD_GROUPS_DESC: The groups of contents the video is part of. Users can have permissions on a group of contents. Use it to enable other users to manipulate your video
MEDIAS.FORM_ADD_MEDIA_DESC: The video as an MP4 file or a tar file (video and synchronized images)
MEDIAS.FORM_ADD_THUMBNAIL_DESC: The preview (JPG file) of the video
MEDIAS.RETRY_SUCCESS: Video processing will be retried soon.
MEDIAS.RELOAD:
All videos successfully updated.

Next reload in 30s.
MEDIAS.NOT_READY:
This video need to be formated to be streamed. The process is currently running.

Please, try again in few minutes.
MEDIAS.UPLOAD_CANCELED: Upload canceled. File was not uploaded.

PROPERTIES.TITLE: Custom properties
PROPERTIES.INFO: Custom properties help you add extra information to videos. By default, a video has two properties, the video title and the video description. All the properties defined here will be available while editing a video.
PROPERTIES.NO_PROPERTIES: No custom properties at the moment
PROPERTIES.FORM_ADD_NAME_DESC: Name of the property as it will appear while editing a video
PROPERTIES.FORM_ADD_DESCRIPTION_DESC: A short description of the property
PROPERTIES.FORM_ADD_TYPE_DESC: Choose a form element that will be used to set the property value
PROPERTIES.FORM_ADD_LIST_VALUES_DESC: Add values to the list (press "enter" to add a new value)

CATEGORIES.TITLE: Categories
CATEGORIES.INFO: Define new categories in order to make media organization and search easier.
CATEGORIES.EMPTY: An empty category could not be added.

EDITOR.TITLE: Rich Media Edition
EDITOR.INFO: Adding chapters ar tags allows a better organization of your content. For each chapter, a description can be added to explain the content or add extra information. With tags, you can pin important moment in your content and adding files to add informations.
EDITOR.DELETE_END_CUT: End cut can't be before start cut. End cut will be deleted.
EDITOR.SAVE_ERROR: An error occured. Your changes could not be saved.
EDITOR.NO_CHAPTERS:
No chapter.
Click "New" to add one.
EDITOR.NO_TAGS:
No tag.
Click "New" to add one.
EDITOR.UPLOAD_CANCELED: Upload was canceled by user. File was not uploaded.

CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Publish - Configuration
CONFIGURATION.YOUTUBE_INFO: Publish needs to be connected to a Google Account that allow connection to Youtube API.
CONFIGURATION.UPLOAD_INFO: You can to define default upload option as default owner or default group of a video.
